headline: Should Investors Follow Buffett Into VeriSign Stock?
summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has long held a position in VeriSign (NASDAQ: VRSN).  Berkshire has earned massive gains in the stock in its 13-year history of holding shares, but the sudden resurgence in interest comes as a surprise.  Given this activity, should investors follow the lead of Buffett's team and buy shares or remain on the sidelines?

headline: VeriSign: Boring But Promising
summary: VeriSign's monopolistic control over .com and .net domains positions it to withstand economic downturns. Read why I rate VRSN stock a hold now.
